t: Share your unique story and connect with customers with the new A+ Content: Brand Story
s: With A+ Content Brand Story, you can set up a single version of your brand-focused content and publish it to all ASINs within your brand, reserving the rich content in the Product Description section of the detail page for supplemental feature information at a product level.
